text: Captain Marvel is the name of many fictional superheroes. They appear in American comic books published by Marvel Comics. Most of these versions exist in the Marvel Universe. The most well-known incarnation of the character is Carol Danvers. ==Cast== In the Marvel Cinematic Universe, Captain Marvel is Carol Danvers, portrayed by Brie Larson in Captain Marvel, Avengers: Endgame (both 2019), Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings (2021), and the Disney+ television series Ms. Marvel (2022). Brie Larson reprised her role in the sequel The Marvels (2023). Mckenna Grace portrayed a young Carol in Captain Marvel. Category:Marvel Comics superheroes
title: Captain Marvel (Marvel Comics)
